Name: Tomb Towers
About the game: The Kingdom has been filled with monsters and skeletons, no thanks to the evil necromancer. You are a nameless soldier and have taken it upon yourself to pursue him to his own tower, capture him, and present him to the king. It wonâ€™t be easy, though. The necromancer has prepared for intruders... Features: - Nostalgic gaming experience. - Pixel-art style reminiscent of MSX-era games. - 45+ Main levels that challenge your puzzle-solving and timing skills. - 15 Unlockable levels to give you more difficult puzzles and special contraptions. - Colourful enemies with unique behaviours and special contraptions to help you traverse levels.
